script.name: plugin.casino.menu.blackjack
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='cycrow.casino.pageid' $DEFINE.LOW = 1000 $DEFINE.HIGH = 100000 $player.name = get player name $dealer.name = get global variable: name='casino.dealer' $table.data = get global variable: name='casino.data' $player.bet = get global variable: name='casino.bet'
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] $dealer.name = $a.data set global variable: name='casino.dealer' value=$dealer.name gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'blackjack.menu' if $selection == 'blackjack.play.menu' if $value == 'finished' $player.wins = get global variable: name='casino.winnings' if $player.wins > 0 START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=1339 priority=40 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1000 add player money: $player.wins, transaction object=$a.ship, page=$page.id, textid=502, $read.text, null, null, null, null end gosub sub.ClearVars end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Select] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] if $menu.id == 'blackjack.menu' if $selection == 'low' OR $selection == 'high' if $selection == 'low' $cost = $DEFINE.LOW else $cost = $DEFINE.HIGH end gosub sub.DoPayment set global variable: name='casino.bet' value=$cost set global variable: name='casino.state' value=1 gosub sub.BuildPlayMenu return $input end
else if $menu.id == 'blackjack.play.menu' if $selection == 'continue' $status = get global variable: name='casino.state' $all.standing = [FALSE] if $status >= 2 $all.standing = [TRUE] $game.players = $table.data['players'] $i = size of array $game.players while $i dec $i = $player = $game.players[$i] if not $table.data['stand'][$player] $hand = $table.data[$player] gosub sub.CountHand if $ret.count <= 21 $all.standing = [FALSE] break end end end end if $all.standing set global variable: name='casino.state' value=6 else inc $status = set global variable: name='casino.state' value=$status end gosub sub.BuildPlayMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input else if $selection == 'hit' OR $selection == 'stand' $status = get global variable: name='casino.state' inc $status = set global variable: name='casino.state' value=$status set global variable: name='casino.player' value=$selection gosub sub.BuildPlayMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] gosub sub.ClearVars set global variable: name='casino.dealer' value=null end
return null
sub.ClearVars: set global variable: name='casino.data' value=null set global variable: name='casino.state' value=null set global variable: name='casino.player' value=null set global variable: name='casino.winnings' value=null set global variable: name='casino.bet' value=null endsub
sub.CountHand: $ret.count = 0 $aces = 0 if $hand $hand.i = 0 $hand.size = size of array $hand while $hand.i < $hand.size $card = $hand[$hand.i] gosub sub.GetCard if $card.value == 1 $card.value = 11 inc $aces = end $ret.count = $ret.count + $card.value inc $hand.i = end
while $ret.count > 21 AND $aces $ret.count = $ret.count - 10 dec $aces = end end endsub
sub.DoDealerRound: if not $table.data['stand']['dealer'] $deal.hit = [TRUE] $hand = $table.data['dealer'] gosub sub.CountHand if $ret.count > 21 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1113 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.col else if $ret.count < 17 $deal.round = 'dealer' gosub sub.DealCard gosub sub.CountHand if $ret.count > 21 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1113 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.col else if $ret.count >= 17 $all.standing = [TRUE] $game.players = $table.data['players'] $i = size of array $game.players while $i dec $i = $player = $game.players[$i] $all.standing = [TRUE] if not $table.data['stand'][$player.name] $all.standing = [FALSE] break end end if $all.standing $table.data['stand']['dealer'] = [TRUE] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1111 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.col end end else $table.data['stand']['dealer'] = [TRUE] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1111 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.col end end endsub
sub.DoPayment: $player.money = get player money if $player.money < $cost START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=1254 priority=40 return null end $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1000 remove player money: $cost, transaction object=$a.ship, page=$page.id, textid=502, $read.text, null, null, null, null endsub
sub.GetCard: $card.suit = ( $card - 1 ) / 13 $card.value = $card mod 13 do if $card.value == 0 OR $card.value == 11 OR $card.value == 12 $card.value = 10 endsub
sub.DealCard: $deck = $table.data['deck'] $card = get first item in array: $deck remove element from array $deck at index 0
if $deal.round == 'dealer' if $deal.hit $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1109, null, null, null, null, null else $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1100, null, null, null, null, null end else if $deal.hit $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1110, $deal.round, null, null, null, null else $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1101, $deal.round, null, null, null, null end end $hand = $table.data[$deal.round] if not $hand $hand = array alloc: size=0 $table.data[$deal.round] = $hand end append $card to array $hand $text.columns = array alloc: size=1 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text.col if $status == 2 AND $deal.round == 'dealer' $text = '???' $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=200 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=$text.colour text='???' append $text.col to array $text.columns else @ $text.columns = [THIS] -> call script plugin.casino.drawcardcolumn : Card=$card Position=200 Column Array=$text.columns end add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.columns endsub
sub.AddContinueCommand: $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1008 $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='continue' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret endsub
sub.AddPlayCommands: $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1005 $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='hit' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1006 $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='stand' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret endsub
sub.DisplayHand: $hand = $table.data[$deal.round] $is.card.hidden = [FALSE] do if $status == 2 AND $deal.round == 'dealer' $is.card.hidden = [TRUE] if $hand gosub sub.CountHand if $deal.round == 'dealer' if $is.card.hidden $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1103, '???', null, null, null, null else $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1103, $ret.count, null, null, null, null end else $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1104, $deal.round, $ret.count, null, null, null end add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
$hand.i = 0 $hand.size = size of array $hand while $hand.i < $hand.size
$card = $hand[$hand.i] if $hand.i == 1 AND $is.card.hidden $text.columns = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Bold] text='???' else @ $text.columns = [THIS] -> call script plugin.casino.drawcardcolumn : Card=$card Position=20 Column Array=[NULL] end
add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.columns
inc $hand.i = end end endsub
sub.DisplayHands: $deal.round = $player.name gosub sub.DisplayHand $deal.round = 'dealer' gosub sub.DisplayHand endsub
sub.BuildPlayMenu: $menu = create custom menu array
$has.continue = [FALSE]
$status = get global variable: name='casino.state' $player.role = get global variable: name='casino.player' if $status == 1 $table.data = table alloc set global variable: name='casino.data' value=$table.data @ $deck = [THIS] -> call script plugin.casino.shuffledeck : $table.data['deck'] = $deck $table = table alloc $table.data['stand'] = $table $game.players = create new array, arguments='dealer', $player.name, null, null, null $table.data['players'] = $game.players $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1102, $dealer.name, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text $deal.round = $player.name gosub sub.DealCard $deal.round = 'dealer' gosub sub.DealCard $has.continue = [TRUE]
else if $status == 2 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1105, $dealer.name, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text $deal.round = $player.name gosub sub.DealCard $deal.round = 'dealer' gosub sub.DealCard
* check for blackjack $has.blackjack = [FALSE] $game.players = $table.data['players'] $i = size of array $game.players while $i dec $i = $player = $game.players[$i] $hand = $table.data[$player] gosub sub.CountHand if $ret.count == 21 skip if $has.blackjack add info line section to menu: $menu $has.blackjack = [TRUE] if $player == 'dealer' $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1122, null, null, null, null, null else $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1123, $player, null, null, null, null end add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text end end
if $has.blackjack $has.continue = [TRUE] $i = size of array $game.players while $i dec $i = $player = $game.players[$i] $table.data['stand'][$player] = [TRUE] end end
else if $status == 6 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1115, null, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
else if $status > 2 if $status == 3 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1106, $dealer.name, null, null, null, null else if $status == 4 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1107, $dealer.name, null, null, null, null else if $status == 5 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1108, $dealer.name, null, null, null, null end add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
$deal.hit = [TRUE] if $table.data['stand'][$player.name] $has.continue = [TRUE] else if $player.role == 'hit' $deal.round = $player.name gosub sub.DealCard gosub sub.CountHand if $ret.count > 21 $table.data['stand'][$player.name] = [TRUE] $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1114, $player.name, null, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text $has.continue = [TRUE] end else if $player.role == 'stand' $table.data['stand'][$player.name] = [TRUE] $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1112, $dealer.name, null, null, null, null $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text $has.continue = [TRUE] end end gosub sub.DoDealerRound end
add info line section to menu: $menu gosub sub.DisplayHands
if $status == 6 $game.players = $table.data['players'] $closest.value = 21 $closest = null $closest.tie = [FALSE] $i = size of array $game.players while $i dec $i = $player = $game.players[$i] $hand = $table.data[$player] gosub sub.CountHand if $ret.count <= 21 $diff = 21 - $ret.count if $closest.value == $diff $closest.tie = [TRUE] else if $closest.value > $diff $closest.tie = [FALSE] $closest = $player $closest.value = $diff end end end
add info line section to menu: $menu
$player.wins = 0 if not $closest $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1121, null, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text else if $closest.tie $player.wins = $player.bet $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1120, null, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text else if $closest == 'dealer' $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1116, null, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text else $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1117, $closest, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text if $closest == $player.name $hand = $table.data[$closest] gosub sub.CountHand $hand.size = size of array $hand if $hand.size == 2 AND $ret.count == 21 $player.wins = $player.bet + ( $player.bet / 2 ) else if $ret.count <= 16 $player.wins = $player.bet + ( $player.bet / 2 ) else $player.wins = $player.bet * 2 end end end
if $player.wins set global variable: name='casino.winnings' value=$player.wins $text = convert number $player.wins to string $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1118, $text, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text end
$read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1119, null, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='finished' else if $has.continue gosub sub.AddContinueCommand else gosub sub.AddPlayCommands end add section to custom menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1007 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='forfeit' end
set menu option: $menu, override infoline size=30 set menu option: $menu, prevent kill=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, disallow close=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, icon=125
$text = read text: page=$page.id id=1000 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=500, $dealer.name, null, null, null, null $input = create input: id='blackjack.play.menu' menu=$menu title=$text description=$read.text callback=null endsub
sub.BuildMenu: $menu = create custom menu array $text = convert number $DEFINE.LOW to string $text2 = convert number $DEFINE.HIGH to string $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1001, $text, $text2, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1002 $text = convert number $DEFINE.LOW to string $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s %s]', $text, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='low' $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1003 $text = convert number $DEFINE.HIGH to string $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s %s]', $text, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='high' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret
add section to custom menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1004 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='leave'
set menu option: $menu, icon=125
$text = read text: page=$page.id id=1000 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=500, $dealer.name, null, null, null, null $input = create input: id='blackjack.menu' menu=$menu title=$text description=$read.text callback=null endsub return null
